reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Impact Evaluation for Resilience Learning in the Sahel
Impact Evaluation for Resilience Learning in the Sahel

description.narrative: The aim of the evaluation approach is to contribute to effective programme implementation and institutional, transnational learning within the framework of the Sahel Resilienz Initiative (and beyond).
Ziel des Evaluierungsansatzes ist es, zu einer effektiven Progammumsetzung und institutionellem, länderübergeifendem Lernen im Rahmen der Sahel-Resilienz-Initiative (und darüber hinaus) beizutragen.

The aim of the evaluation approach is to contribute to effective programme implementation and institutional, transnational learning within the framework of the Sahel Resilienz Initiative (and beyond).
